Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-0853 affecting package curl for versions less than 8.8.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-0853 affecting package curl for versions less than 8.8.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package curl is earlier than 8.8.0-1, affected by CVE-2024-0853
